          <title>
            <string language="hu">A görög polisz</string>
            <string language="en">The Greek Polis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Griechische Polis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Polis Grec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Polis Grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Polis Greco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ελληνικό Polis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Polis Griego</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A görög polisz létrejötte, társadalom és gazdaság</string>
            <string language="en">The Greek Polis come into begin, society and economy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hellász,  Athén,  Spárta,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hellas, Athen, Sparta,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das griechische Polis kommen in anfangen, 
Gesellschaft und Wirtschaft</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Grec Polis hérité commencent, société et 
économie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Polis grego vem em começa, sociedade e 
economia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Greco Polis entrato in comincia, società ed 
economia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ελληνικό Polis που μπαίνουν αρχίζει, κοινωνία 
και οικονομία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Polis griego viene en comienza, sociedad y 
economía</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hellas, Athen, Sparta,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hellas, Athen, Sparta,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hellas, Athen, Sparta,</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hellas, Athen, Sparta,</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
